title: Two caps for blackletter fiends
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080927033746im_/http:/typophile.com/files/cf_4713.jpg)
  
I know it’s blurry - that’s why I have to redraw it. How close can we get to nailing the exact blackletter font?

Thanks!

 [‹ american gothic or british grotesque or …?](http://web.archive.org/web/20080927033746/http:/typophile.com/node/49891 "Go to previous forum topic") [Does someone know this font? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080927033746/http:/typophile.com/node/49858 "Go to next forum topic")
author: elzadra

comments.content:
It actually seems to be Wedding Text. Jeez.

I always expect something more obscure...

Hi Kate,

that’s [Linotext](http://web.archive.org/web/20080927033746/http:/www.fontshop.com/search/?q=linotext&sample_text=C%20F&sample_size=144) aka [Wedding Text](http://web.archive.org/web/20080927033746/http:/www.fontshop.com/search/?q=wedding+text&sample_text=C%20F&sample_size=144) aka [Mariage](http://web.archive.org/web/20080927033746/http:/www.fontshop.com/search/?q=mariage&sample_text=C%20F&sample_size=144).  
F
